positive.review: A fun alternative to among us, it's free, silly and fun to play!

easy set up with few levels. so easy a 9 year old can figure it out themselves. only ugly part is the toxic adults who target people due to there lack of common knowledge and or just straight discriminating against race or even a petty name.
The game is good, it is like Among US, but it is a lot more fun and has more game mechanics, etc. 9/10
Fun game to play with both friends and strangers alike. Very addicting.

I like it, I wanna play it more with my friends and I watch streamers play the game all the time. Better than among us. Playing with a large group of people would be so worth it, especially with all the roles.

If you have bunch of friends, free time and want to enjoy some relaxing game.
it is very similar to among us but goose goose duck has far more roles with different tasks and voicechat. I have enjoyed the game so far.

Goose Goose Duck is pure chaos in the best way. It‚Äôs basically ‚ÄòAmong Us but unhinged,‚Äô and honestly that‚Äôs what makes it so fun.
The roles are wild, the maps are goofy, and every match turns into some dumb, hilarious drama. One moment you‚Äôre doing tasks, the next you‚Äôre yelling at your friends because a duck sabotaged everything and blamed you.
It doesn‚Äôt take itself seriously at all, and that goofy energy keeps it super replayable. If you like social deduction games but want them louder, messier, and funnier, this is the one.
Game has lot of content. there are many roles compared to among us and it is very a fun game with friends.
This is a wonderful game and the developers are quick on fixing any problems that may happen. They silently became the biggest competition for another similar game and did it better.
Awesome game to play with the homies or with randos. Either way still a fun time
Good game with more rols than evry other amungus inspierd game i playd
absolutley halarious, can not trust anyone, everyone is cold blooded most fun ever

Really really fun game- but there is very little to do about toxic players. I am certain they don't actually get banned or removed. There were several people screaming slurs or just being awful. I played with someone called wet(something) and they were bashing everyone every 5 minute. Not going to say their full name but yeah.

Goose Goose Duck is a very fun game where you are a duck and you have to survive or kill other ducks or get kicked out in a vote and more. I recommend playing this game with friends, BUT if you don't have any you can play with other players using voice chat or just chat, I've played this game for about 5 hours now and I'm still enjoying it and that can't be said about most free games. 10/10 (better than AMONG US)
Really fun to play with friends - takes a minute to figure out the map and some of the tasks but, once you do, it's super easy.
it is among us butt with modz and is verie cool
played imposter before, didn't though this game good, but yeah, although difficult to understand at first. its actully good. the spekin ability is fun.

Last I heard is some screams before I found 2 bodies in the hallway...
they thought I was the murderer
A very fun game with friends is a more advanced version of amongus.
great way to have fun and connect with others!
Great game if you want to have fun with friends (at least 5)
Its very fun if you have a mic or play with friends.
i like this game| this is basically like among us but free and it has its own features!
Its so fun like Amunngus u'll get adicted
free, bunch of possibilities, fun
Great game with friends. Not so good alone.
super fun easy to play it, it also has adult lobbies to avoid kids
This is so much better than Among Us, and has so much more to offer.  It is addicting and a delightful way to cause chaos among friends.  Strongly recommend!!
its a good game to play with friends if you cant afford actual among us, but want a cute but free version of it.
Love this stupid game! Truly so many good people, good times, great laughs! give it a shot

SUPER FUN i highly recommend it is the better version of among us for steam vc as well i  really enjoy it hope this review helps and remember 40 days until Chritmas make sure to be nice it is nearing christmas

Its really fun to play with FRIENDS

negative.review:
I do not recommend this game. The worst UX 

First, you cannot access friend's list while you are playing. On #feedback channel of Goose Goose Duck Discord server, I raised this issue on 6 Nov 25. 
Chris/Canadian_Thor who is one of the Gaggle Crew (I guess the dev team) replied on 8 Nov 25 that the inability to access Friend's list while in game was "to prevent coordination and unfair gameplay while in match. Among other reasons" and that "Rounds don't last too long". 
This inability means that you cannot tell your friends while you are still in game that the room has available slots because it is common that when someone dies early, they just leave the lobby.
It also means that when you see a friend in game, you can message them. But it does not mean they can reply you even though they are online. 
I do not find the reasons given to be acceptable.

Second, once you edit the note on a friend, you cannot delete it. I raised this issue on the same #feedback channel of Goose Goose Duck Discord server on 8 Nov 25. The same person Chris/Canadian_Thor replied that "there is a cooldown to avoid spamming this feature" and a lame condition that "(you will need to have a stable network connection to access all game features)".
Today 16 Nov 25 I tried to delete the note again, I can't. So I replied to the message "there is a cooldown to avoid spamming this feature" that it has been more than one week and I still can't edit the note. I asked how long is the cooldown and whether they would consider adding visual cooldown so that players are informed on when they can edit notes on Friend's list.
What happened next is outrageous. GGDGuidebot deleted my message and replaced it with 
"Moderation
Uh-oh!
It looks like your message was removed because it didn‚Äôt comply with the server rules. Please take a moment to review the guidelines before posting again. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation!".
I saw Chris/Canadian_Thor was typing before my message was removed. It can be implied that the same person Chris/Canadian_Thor decided to remove my message.
What is funny is that the description of the #feedback channel of Goose Goose Duck Discord server is "We welcome all feedback, whether positive or negative, as long as it is constructive and helpful. Rudeness, harassment, dogpiling or disrespect towards the developers, community management, or other members will not be tolerated.
Please be considerate when submitting feedback: avoid pinging Gaggle staff and strive to provide constructive comments rather than emotionally charged responses.".
It seems like they are just all talk about "welcome all feedback".
Again, I do not accept their given reason of "avoid spamming this feature". Just compare this feature to that on Discord or any other social media. You can just rename, edit notes without any cooldown. Also, who would spam this feature?

You will not encounter these problems if you never want to use those features: connect to friends while in game and editing notes on Friend's list. So feel free to play if you do not think this game will deteriorate your mental health in one way or another. But I do not plan to play this game ever again.

It's really strange--Among Us works great, all other more complicated online games I play work, everything does fine on my internet except this game. It won't allow me to load into a game anymore. GGD help insists the problem is my internet and not the game. Clearly my internet only doesn't work when Goose is up. It must be selectively against the bird.

I do not recommend this game because it looks really information harvesting. it has so many terms and conditions that nobody is going 2 read and it made me install an anti cheat that may or may not be infiltrating my computer and WHAT GAME ASKS FOR YOU SOCIAL SECURITY number and that is why I do not recommend this game

‚≠ê‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ (1/5)

ü¶Ü Goose Goose Duck offers a social deduction concept similar to *Among Us* or *Super Sus*,  
but unfortunately, the gameplay experience falls short.  

Matchmaking takes a long time ‚Äî likely due to a shrinking player base ‚Äî  
and frequent disconnections occur even with a stable internet connection.  

üé≠ The idea itself has potential, but poor performance and unstable servers make it difficult to enjoy.  
I can‚Äôt recommend this game in its current state,  
though I hope future updates can bring improvements to revive its potential.
It just doesn't tickle my fancy
jo game csak sok a vereb
who's playing this game really ?
It's not fun

nice
Broken game
very amny feminist
Ducks
mid
dumbassshit

This game launches with questionable software asking to verify email. That's well and fine except after it does, it still doesn't really recognize your email. It launches by default in windowed mode. So many things about this game scream "Stealing your info". Not worth it, even for free. Don't download.

this game is FILLED with disgusting pedophiles and men who harass you for nudes. I would NEVER let my child play this game and the complete lack of monitoring or bans on these sick player accounts is absurd.

I sure hope the whole mandatory registration thing is worth it for you, because it has just prevented three people from playing this game. 

In all three cases the registration process failed in some way. 
First one was the register button staying grayed out without any feedback,
second one was "this email is already registered" although it for sure isn't and password reset going nowhere,
the third one never received the confirmation email and after three times or so was temporarily disabled due to too many failed "login attempts". I was trying to register, guys, because for some reason you want that.

Can't even play the actual game anymore, every server is 18+ or just a hangout area among us is 10x better then this could ever be, I would say this was better like over a year ago. now everything is just an online dater havoc

Seems unnecessary being forced to make an account just to play. The rounds were filled with screaming and chaos, which some may enjoy, but I do not. 

I'll stick to Duck Duck Goose.

Amongus can manage without it, they could too

You can't even launch the game and play a non-public round

So I was playing this game on my phone before I switched to getting it on steam. For my steam deck this game has problems and bugs. This game is awesome on the phone for me.  But for steam deck I can hear people in the lobby.  I can hear the game in the background.  As soon as the game starts however.  I can't hear anything.  The audio of the game is silent i can't hear people talking.  It's a big problem and also my mic stops working.  Major issue. Makes you playing pretty much impossible. I genuinely cannot play this game anymore on steam deck cause of this issue. So I just play on my phone now
Didn't get killer after 20+ games in a row.  This game is dog shit,  do not play it.  Play among us instead.
